MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the WA2 and WA5 area of Warrington which has been caused by the impact of flooding  due to Storm Christoph. Engineers are currently assessing the damage and working closely with the Environment Agency. When it is safe to commence repairs we will make every effort to restore supplies by 2PM tomorrow 22nd of Jan 2021. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 5pm on 21st of January 2021.
